00004 struct ContextBase
00005 {
00006     static const int MAX_DASH_LEN = 32;
00007     
00008     // Mode settings
00009     VGFillRule                      fillRule;
00010     VGBlendMode                     blendMode;
00011     
00012     // Stroke parameters
00013     VGdouble                        strokeLineWidth;
00014     VGCapStyle                      strokeCapStyle;
00015     VGJoinStyle                     strokeJoinStyle;
00016     VGdouble                        strokeMiterLimit;
00017     VGdouble                        strokeDashPattern[MAX_DASH_LEN];
00018     VGint                           strokeDashSize;
00019     VGdouble                        strokeDashPhase;
00020 
00021     // Color for vgClear
00022     vgColor                         clearColor;
00023     vgColor                         fillColor;
00024     vgColor                         lineColor;
00025     vgColor                         textColor;
00026 
00027     VGPixelLayout                   pixelLayout;
00028     
00029     VGint                           clipMinX;   
00030     VGint                           clipMinY;   
00031     VGint                           clipWidth;
00032     VGint                           clipHeight;
00033                 
00034     ContextBase()
00035     :   fillRule(VG_EVEN_ODD),
00036         blendMode(VG_BLEND_SRC_OVER),
00037         
00038         // Stroke parameters
00039         strokeLineWidth(1.0f),
00040         strokeCapStyle(VG_CAP_BUTT),
00041         strokeJoinStyle(VG_JOIN_MITER),
00042         strokeMiterLimit(4.0f),
00043         strokeDashSize(0),
00044         strokeDashPhase(0.0f),
00045                             
00046         // Color for vgClear
00047         clearColor(0,0,0,0),
00048         fillColor(255,255,255,255),
00049         lineColor(0,0,255,255),
00050         textColor(0,255,255,255),
00051         
00052         pixelLayout(VG_PIXEL_LAYOUT_UNKNOWN),
00053         clipMinX(0),
00054         clipMinY(0),
00055         clipWidth(1),
00056         clipHeight(1)
00057     {   
00058     }
00059 };

00094 
00095 class StateSaver
00096 {
00097         static const int MAX = 32;
00098         unsigned char stack[MAX][sizeof(ContextBase)];
00099         int current;
00100     public:
00101         StateSaver()
00102         {
00103             current = 0;
00104         }
00105         
00106         void Save(void* ctx)
00107         {
00108             void* memory = &((vgContext *)ctx)->fillRule;
00109             if (current<MAX)
00110                 memmove( &stack[current++][0], memory, sizeof(ContextBase) );
00111         }
00112         void Restore(void* ctx)
00113         {
00114             if (current>0)
00115                 memmove( ctx, &stack[--current][0], sizeof(ContextBase) );
00116         }
00117 };
